text:
Hi guys,
i've got a problem with log in.
I am expected to enter the confirmation code that HubSpot is supposed to send me to my email but they don't.
Their troubleshooting instructions just don't work.

Any suggestions?

Contact customer service.

This channel is for questions about email development.

Since this isn't email _development_ related, I would suggest cross-posting this in another channel like <#C22PU4LV8|general>. This channel is pretty quiet and mainly for the development of HTML emails/templates.
<@UKGV272KS> Thanks for the tip. I'm going to post it to general.
